active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs of synchronous vs. asynchronous data replication methods for a high-availability banking system. Consider impacts on the CIA triad: How does each method affect availability during outages, integrity during transfers, and confidentiality across sites? Cite FFIEC guidelines and provide real-world examples.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
